pr_title: [BEAM-9812] Fixing bug causing pipelines requiring temp tables to not work

timeline.bodyText: Probably update the spec above to mention that a new object will be returned ?
timeline.author: chamikaramj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -182,7 +182,10 @@ def parse_table_reference(table, dataset=None, project=None):
   """
 
   if isinstance(table, bigquery.TableReference):
-    return table
+    return bigquery.TableReference(

replies.bodyText: Another option might be to create a new object at line 343 which might be cleaner
replies.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: Ah... ok.. I can do that second option
replies.author: pabloem

replies.bodyText: on second thought, I think it's a better practice to avoid reusing objects, and create copies for clarity...
replies.author: pabloem
